===============
Getting Started
===============

Launch PelePlop gui
--------------------

The most simple way to use our program is throught the GUI.
Simply run:

        python gui.py

- Run PlopRotTemp will only parametrize the ligand
- Run PelePlop will run PlopRotTemp and Pele.

Run from the command line
-------------------------

Another alternative approach is to launch the program from the command line as:

		$ bash PelePlop.sh [option] pdbfile ligand_residue ligand_chain

		e.g. $ bash PelePlop.sh Samples/jak2_999_complex_processed.pdb LIG Z
